reviewText: I have been using the Bev Harris "Prime Time Fitness" video 3 times a week for 3 months and decided to up my routine.  This one really tested my commitment to getting healthier and stronger.  I had to really had to push myself to complete the first run through.  I am a 63 years old and in good health.
It's a great tape for seniors.  I have used Bev Harris' exercise tapes for more than 20 years and Iove them.  This tape is great for me -- I am 78 years  old.
